ðŸ“– Summary: Dear ImGui is a bloat-free C++ graphical user interface library designed for rapid development of tools and visualizations. It prioritizes simplicity, portability, and efficiency, making it suitable for integration into game engines, real-time applications, and embedded systems. It empowers programmers to create dynamic UIs with minimal dependencies.
